plot outline: A journalism student ends up in the hamlets of Malnad due to her inquisitive nature. She stumbles on the story of Hombanna - a local botanist - and how he ends up facing the heat of forest land encroachment. What happens to him and his people?
title: Hombanna
plot: Its good movie ,Worth to watch great acting by actor DhanuGowda and varsha,they never seems to be debutant actors...

A journalism student ends up in the hamlets of Malnad due to her inquisitive nature. She stumbles on the story of _Hombanna_ (qv) - a local botanist - and how he ends up facing the heat of forest land encroachment. What happens to him and his people?::sukanya suresh
